name: Love Kills (tea_mori)
description:
Once upon a time, there was a girl named Celia who was separated from her love and trapped in the lowest layer of the underworld. Determined to find his love, her love, R, vowed to travel as far as it would take to bring her back. 

In this short 2D platformer, face death in order to reach the lowest level of the underworld, save Celia and bring her back to the world of the living. Run into dangerous items to decrease your health, but beware of healing items!

Controls: 

A.........Move Left

D............Move Right

Space............Jump

S.........Move Down

Run into powerups hidden in the level to boost your jumping powers and speed. 

This game was made within 72 hours as part of the Wowie Jam 3.0.
